yacl3.config.ntr:config.disableTextureRo: Disables texture rotations based on their position
yacl3.config.ntr:config.disableOffsets.d: Disables blocks like flowers position being offset based on their position
yacl3.config.ntr:config.mode.description: Configures if rotations/offsets are fully cancelled or replaced with a secure random implementation.
